Class ClassInspectionComposite

java.lang.Object

                  de.wwu.muggl.ui.gui.components.ClassInspectionComposite
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.eclipse.swt.graphics.Drawable
public class ClassInspectionComposite
extends org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Composite

The composite for the ClassInspectionWindow. It offers most of its element and the corresponding methods.

Version:
1.0.0, 2010-06-05
Author:
Tim Majchrzak

Constructor Detail

ClassInspectionComposite

public ClassInspectionComposite(ClassInspectionWindow parent,
                                org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Shell shell,
                                org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Display display,
                                int style,
                                java.lang.String className,
                                ClassFile classFile)
Set up the composite for the ClassInspectionWindow window.

Parameters:
parent - The windows this composite belongs to.
shell - The current Shell.
display - The current Display.
style - The style for this composite.
className - The name of the class to inspect.
classFile - The ClassFile to inspect.

                        ClassFile classFile)
Load the class structure into a Tree.

Parameters:
className - The name of the class to load.
classFile - The classFile to load.

Get for the class to inspect.

Returns:

browseAll

protected void browseAll(boolean value,
                         java.lang.String find)
Browse trough all nodes of the tree, trying to find the String that is searched for (if it is not null).

Parameters:
value - If set to true, the tree will be expanded. It will be collapsed otherwise.
find - The String to find. If set to null, the whole tree will be expandes or collapsed.

browseAll

protected boolean browseAll(org.eclipse.swt.widgets.TreeItem item,
                            boolean value,
                            java.lang.String find)
Browse trough all nodes of the tree beginning at the TreeItem item, trying to find the String that is searched for (if it is not null).

Parameters:
item - The TreeItem to start searching at. Only subitems will be searched for.
value - If set to true, the tree will be expanded. It will be collapsed otherwise.
find - The String to find. If set to null, the whole tree will be expandes or collapsed.
Returns:
true, if the item was found or value was null, false otherwise.

searchTree

protected void searchTree()
Search the tree. Before doing so, set the field for skipping the first x found entries to 0.

resetSearchButton

protected void resetSearchButton()
Reset the search button as well as the field for skipping the first x found entries.

getCurrentItem

protected org.eclipse.swt.widgets.TreeItem getCurrentItem()
Get the currently selected item.

Returns:
The currently selected TreeItem.

saveClassFileAs

protected void saveClassFileAs()
Open a file dialog. After the user has chosen the file name to save the class to, generate an output stream and write the ClassFile.
